Changelog
=========

All notable changes to UrbanCode will be documented in this file.

The format is based on `Keep a Changelog <https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/>`_,
and this project adheres to `Semantic Versioning <https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html>`_.

[0.1.1] - 2024-03-21
--------------------

Added
~~~~~
* Initial release of UrbanCode package
* Street View Image (SVI) analysis module
* Urban perception module with Two-Stage Neural Network
* Network analysis module using OSMnx
* Example notebooks for feature extraction and perception analysis

Changed
~~~~~~~
* None

Deprecated
~~~~~~~~~~
* None

Removed
~~~~~~~
* None

Fixed
~~~~~
* None

Security
~~~~~~~~
* None
